Intro: DreamWorks Dragons is an American computer-animated television series airing on Cartoon Network based on the 2010 film How to Train Your Dragon. The series serves as a bridge between the first film and its 2014 sequel. Riders of Berk follows Hiccup as he tries to keep balance within the new cohabitation of Dragons and Vikings. Alongside keeping up with Berk’s newest installment — A Dragon Training Academy — Hiccup, Toothless, and the rest of the Viking Teens are put to the test when they are faced with new worlds harsher than Berk, new dragons that can’t all be trained, and new enemies who are looking for every reason to destroy the harmony between Vikings and Dragons all together.

Episodes.Intro: Dragons are still dragons, and as a result, they are causing mayhem in the Isle of Berk. Stoick is reconsidering allowing the dragons to roam freely on Berk. It is up to Hiccup and his friends to convince Stoick otherwise.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x1

Episodes.Intro: The teens of Berk find a mysterious girl named Heather on Thor’s Beach. While Hiccup and the other teens openly welcome the newcomer, Astrid’s jealousy turns to suspicion when she notices Heather is taking an unusual interest in the Book of Dragons.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x10

Episodes.Intro: Heather’s betrayal to Berk caused the Book of Dragons to fall into Alvin the Treacherous’ hands, and Heather’s imprisonment on Berk. In order to get the book back from Alvin, Astrid disguises herself as Heather and goes into Outcast Territory. Towards the end of her mission, Astrid learns and confirms Heather’s true motives for helping the Outcasts.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x11

Episodes.Intro: Berk’s annual festive sporting competition, the Thawfest games, is underway and all the teens are participating with the dragons for the first time in Viking history. Hiccup is determined to finally best Snotlout, who constantly gloats about being the reigning Thawfest champion, but Hiccup’s successes begin to make him arrogant and boastful, much to Astrid’s displeasure and disappointment.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x12

Episodes.Intro: Sudden lightning storms are endangering the residents of Berk and it is believed Thor is angry at the island. Mildew leads the superstitious villagers into blaming Toothless, “the unholy offspring of lightning and death itself”, for the lightning, leaving Hiccup to find the true answers for Thor’s sudden destructive anger.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x13

Episodes.Intro: A rogue dragon – a Whispering Death – shows up in Berk, tearing up the village. He’s on a mission to find Toothless and settle a score. Despite Hiccup’s efforts to help, Toothless insists on facing the dragon alone. But unlike their past battle, Toothless’s inability to fly my prove to be his undoing.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x14

Episodes.Intro: Dagur the Deranged visits Berk to renew a peace treaty between the Berserkers and Berk, and the dragons are put into hiding to dispel rumours that Berk is training a dragon army. But when Ruffnut and Tuffnut begin to fight, their dragon, Barf and Belch, is left out of control. The Viking youths must bring the twins back together to control their dragon and avoid provoking Dagur to war.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x15

Episodes.Intro: Caught in a waterspout, Toothless’ prosthetic tail is damaged, rendering him unable to fly and thus leaving him, Hiccup and Snotlout stranded on Outcast Island. The three must work together to repair the damage, overcome the rivalry between Hiccup and Snotlout and return home to Berk before they are captured by Alvin and the Outcasts.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x16

Episodes.Intro: When Hiccup discovers Trader Johann’s ship was shipwrecked in a rumored haunted bog with a gift made for him by his mother, he will stop at nothing to retrieve it.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x17

Episodes.Intro: When Snotlout and the villagers mistake dragon eggs for gems that bring good fortune, Fishlegs, who is responsible for the eggs’ discovery, must take a stand against Snotlout and reunite the eggs with their Changewing mothers before they destroy Berk.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x18

Episodes.Intro: During Berk’s annual Bork week celebrations, Hiccup is granted access to Bork the Bold’s private and personal archives. When he finds information and a map about an island inhabited by Night Furies within Bork’s notes, Hiccup is determined to bring Toothless to his family.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x19

Episodes.Intro: The peace with the dragons has put Gobber out of business, since his job was making weapons to fight dragons. Stoick asks Hiccup to help find a new job for him … but unfortunately a change of profession does not seem to go well with Gobber.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x2

Episodes.Intro: Mildew has betrayed the Vikings of Berk and allowed Alvin the Treacherous to kidnap Hiccup and Toothless. Astrid and Stoick must rescue them from Outcast Island along with help from a new friend.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x20

Episodes.Intro: The dragons unintentionally reduce Berk’s food productivity by still scaring the living daylights out of the local livestock, and with the first winter storm coming, the dragon-riding Viking youths of Berk must try and familiarize the local animals with their Dragon companions.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x3

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup finds an injured baby dragon. Toothless does not warm up to the energetic newcomer and the baby’s angry mother arrives looking for her lost son.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x4

Episodes.Intro: The Dragons are blamed for vandalism, and Hiccup tries to prove their innocence by forming a night patrol called the “Dragon United Monitoring Brigade” (DUMB), but not in time to prevent the dragons’ banishment from the island. Hiccup begins to suspect that Mildew is responsible for the scapegoat.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x5

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup had discovered Mildew framed the dragons but has destroyed all evidence of it, therefore he must prove of their innocence in order to get them back. Meanwhile, Alvin the Treacherous of the Outcast Tribe are on the mission to raid the Isle of Berk in order to find and capture the “Dragon Conqueror”.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x6

Episodes.Intro: Stoick is in need of learning how to ride a dragon, and he quickly insists on riding Toothless all the time. Meanwhile, a mysterious dragon has been attacking fishing ships.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x7

Episodes.Intro: After getting his picture painted with his father, Hiccup begins to fear that he is not Stoick’s ideal son, so to prove himself, he and his friends set out on a treasure hunt that even Stoick had not been able to complete.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x8

Episodes.Intro: After Mildew poisons all the dragons on the island, he is forced to help Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber find and capture the ferocious Scauldron in order to get the antidote.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 1x9

Episodes.Intro: Certain that Alvin is planning an attack on Berk, Stoick institutes flight restrictions on the dragon academy. Hiccup, certain that Alvin will be using his newfound dragon-training knowledge to bolster his attack, forms a secret “Dragon Flight Club” in order to train the kids to defend Berk against Alvin’s dragon army.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x1

Episodes.Intro: When the dragon riders discover a frozen Skrill, a lightning-powered dragon revered by the Berserkers, they scramble to get it off Berk.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x10

Episodes.Intro: Tuffnut goes undercover to help the riders rescue a Skrill.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x11

Episodes.Intro: Snotlout becomes convinced he is dying, and leaves Hookfang to Gustav. But when he “miraculously” recovers, Snotlout takes his dragon back, and Gustav decides to get a dragon of his own and join the academy… whether they want him or not.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x12

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and co. discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. The kids must heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x13

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and Toothless return from a mission to find Berk mysteriously empty. They discover that the village has been overrun by Speed Stingers, a venomous non-flying dragon that has trekked across the frozen sea to Berk.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x14

Episodes.Intro: Hookfang and Stormfly quarrel while the town prepares for the harvest.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x15

Episodes.Intro: Berk has been plagued with a bad case of the Eel Pox. Hiccup, Toothless and the gang, along with Gothi, go gather the ingredients for the cure. There’s just one problem; the final ingredient is an eel from Eel Island.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x16

Episodes.Intro: The mysterious theft of metal objects all over Berk reveals the presence of marauding Smokebreaths. Hiccup and Toothless soon discover that these dragons are the work of Dagur, in a plot to render Berk defenseless.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x17

Episodes.Intro: When three adolescent Thunderdrums attack the village, only Stoick’s Thornado can bring chaos to order.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x18

Episodes.Intro: Snotlout is expelled from the academy; Alvin returns to Berk to make amends.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x19

Episodes.Intro: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself – causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x2

Episodes.Intro: Alvin reveals he trained the Screaming Death to attack Berk and destroy the island’s inhabitants and only Snotlout and Hookfang can save Berk before it’s too late. Meanwhile Hiccup gets ready for a final fight against Dagur to save Toothless and end the barbarians invasion of Berk once and for all.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x20

Episodes.Intro: The kids go on a dragon survival-training mission to Dragon Island, where they encounter Dagur, the Berserker Chief, who has become obsessed with hunting the Night Fury.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x3

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup discovers that the town’s water shortage has been caused by the Outcasts’ plan to hide Whispering Death eggs under Berk, which soon hatch and tunnel underthe island, threatening the villagers.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x4

Episodes.Intro: Hookfang is losing his ability to catch on fire, and it’s up to Snotlout, Hiccup and the others to find the lair of the Fireworm Queen, which may hold the only possible cure, before it’s too late.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x5

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup must help Astrid face her fear of the terrifying Flightmare, a ghostly dragon that seemingly “froze” her uncle with fear, shaming her family name. With Fishlegs’ help, they discover that there’s more to the Flightmare than meets the eye
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x6

Episodes.Intro: A Terrible Terror training competition leads to a heated rivalry between Fishlegs and Snotlout, allowing Alvin to kidnap Meatlug. The kids must use their newly trained Terrors to rescue their friend.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x7

Episodes.Intro: When wild dragons start overwhelming Berk, Hiccup and Toothless discover islands are disappearing throughout the archipelago. When Hiccup and Toothless investigate the cause, they then encounter the Screaming Death.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x8

Episodes.Intro: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves… and a forest fire is approaching.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 2x9

Episodes.Intro: During their search for the escaped Dagur the Deranged, Hiccup and the Dragon Riders discover a mysterious object — one that holds their destiny.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x1

Episodes.Intro: The Dragon Riders are surprised to discover who is behind recent attacks on nearby ships — and to learn exactly what the ships are.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x10

Episodes.Intro: Heather joins the Dragon Riders, but it’s not an easy alliance, especially when Hiccup uncovers a shocking secret about her true identity.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x11

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon’s Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x12

Episodes.Intro: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x13

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island to find the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds the key to the Dragon Eye’s mysteries.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x2

Episodes.Intro: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x3

Episodes.Intro: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover that the indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x4

Episodes.Intro: Thinking he’s allergic to his dragon, Fishlegs gets hypnotized. He wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x5

Episodes.Intro: When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it’s up to Hiccup and the Dragon Riders to get him back.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x6

Episodes.Intro: Fireworms invade Dragon’s Edge, while Ruffnut and Tuffnut discover that they have an unexpected connection to the island.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x7

Episodes.Intro: As a Rumblehorn wreaks havoc on Dragon’s Edge, Hiccup seeks the help of Stoick, who forms an unexpected bond with the rampaging beast.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x8

Episodes.Intro: Fishlegs and Meatlug liberate the Gronckles from a menacing dragon that has encroached on their ancestral home, Dark Deep.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 3x9

Episodes.Intro: After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid agrees to train a group of back up Dragon Riders. Little do they know they will soon be pressed into service.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x1

Episodes.Intro: When a new tidal class dragon, the Sea Shocker, is found in Edge Cove, the riders must help it escape a group of hungry Scauldrons and reunite it with its migrating pod.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x10

Episodes.Intro: The Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless. Hiccup and the Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the rampaging dragon.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x11

Episodes.Intro: The Riders learn from Heather that the Dragon Hunters are after the Flightmare. The Rides race to free the dragon. But could this be part of a larger scheme?
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x12

Episodes.Intro: Viggo has captured Heather and the Flightmare, and now Hiccup must outthink this dangerous new opponent.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x13

Episodes.Intro: When Stormfly is captured by Dragon Hunters, Hiccup and the riders have to find her and rescue her.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x2

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the other riders from the Dragon Hunters.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x3

Episodes.Intro: When Tuffnut is bitten by a strange creature, he believes he will turn into the legendary Lycanwing Dragon when the moon is full. Hiccup and the other riders must save him before Tuffnut goes off to live amongst the dragons forever.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x4

Episodes.Intro: When Snotlout and Astrid are given the task of transporting a ceremonial battle axe to a wedding between their two families, they must put aside their differences when the axe is taken by a new type of dragon – the Armorwing.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x5

Episodes.Intro: When Hiccup saves the Zippleback’s life, the grateful dragon abandons Ruff and Tuff and follows Hiccup and Toothless around. Ruff and Tuff try to win their dragon back – with disastrous results.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x6

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and the Riders must stop Ryker from creating a key to the Dragon Eye, which means a return trip to Glacier Island, this time to protect the Snow Wraith.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x7

Episodes.Intro: When a distress call from Trader Johann arrives at Dragon’s Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout, and Fishlegs go to investigate leaving Astrid, Ruff and Tuff to keep watch on the Edge. When Ruff is captured by Dragon Hunters, it’s up to Astrid and Tuff to defend the Edge.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x8

Episodes.Intro: Tuff and Astrid continue to defend Dragon’s Edge, while Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of wounded dragons that have been hunted and hurt by the Dragon Hunters.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 4x9

Episodes.Intro: While trying to take care of unfinished business, Hiccup and Toothless are lured into a trap. An unlikely rescuer comes to their aid.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x1

Episodes.Intro: The gang investigates why Viggo’s men are mysteriously shipping marble blocks from a quarry. Next, they try to save two dragons being used as slaves.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x10

Episodes.Intro: When Dagur unexpectedly shows up, Hiccup scrambles to prevent him and Heather from discovering each other’s presence.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x11

Episodes.Intro: Snotlout is sent on an undercover mission to Viggo’s dragon auction as part of a plan to rescue the dragons and stop Viggo from getting richer.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x12

Episodes.Intro: When Viggo offers Hiccup a truce, the wary Dragon Riders investigate and find a potential ally in their fight against the Dragon Hunters.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x13

Episodes.Intro: A wounded Fireworm seeks the Dragon Riders’ help in protecting a precious treasure trove against an unfamiliar creature with strange and slimy powers.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x2

Episodes.Intro: When things get out of hand while Fishlegs is left in charge, he seizes another chance to prove he has what it takes to be a leader.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x3

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup’s and Snoutlout’s fathers put aside their differences and work with their sons as a team to defend a storehouse against an unusual invader.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x4

Episodes.Intro: After Astrid makes an alarming discovery, her life comes to depend on a dragon everyone thought was extinct. Her pals race against time to find it.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x5

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup reluctantly allows the Dragon Riders to go to a deserted island for a much-needed vacation, but the getaway has an odd effect on their dragons.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x6

Episodes.Intro: After learning that Fishlegs has been secretly communicating with Heather, the gang invites her to the Edge to convince her to join the Dragon Riders.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x7

Episodes.Intro: When Hiccup and Toothless accidentally land in a Dragon Hunter trap, they find themselves the newest contestants in a gladiator-style arena.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x8

Episodes.Intro: Hiccup and his team rescue a dragon egg and bring it back to the Edge, where it hatches to reveal an ear-splitting surprise!
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 5x9

Episodes.Intro: To prove they’re on the same side and pose no threat, the Dragon Riders try to rescue Queen Mala’s dragon, which Viggo stole to destroy Dragon’s Edge.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 6x1

Episodes.Intro: While trying to stabilize the volcano that threatens to destroy Dragon’s edge, the Riders discover troubling evidence of new Hunter activity.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x1

Episodes.Intro: After Stormfly tangles with two poisonous Slitherwings while defending Garff, Astrid must risk her own life to get an ingredient to make an antidote.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x10

Episodes.Intro: When Ruffnut refuses to become Throk’s bride because it would mean leaving her twin, Tuffnut fakes his own death to give her the freedom to marry.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x11

Episodes.Intro: A sketch in an old diary leads Hiccup and Fishlegs back to Vanaheim, where they help Dagur search for his long-missing father, Oswald the Agreeable.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x12

Episodes.Intro: When Heather goes to meet a man claiming to have seen Oswald, she walks into a trap that forces the Dragon Riders to pay a dear and unexpected price.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x13

Episodes.Intro: As the Riders investigate why traders are disappearing from Northern Markets, Hiccup and Snotlout fall victim to a treasure-hoarding dragon.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x2

Episodes.Intro: The Riders accept an invite to Berserker Island, where their reunion with Heather, Dagur and a young familiar face is interrupted by a sudden revolt.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x3

Episodes.Intro: When SnotLout is rescued from a storm by a tribe of winged women, he thinks he’s gone to Valhalla — until he learns he’s going to be their dinner.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x4

Episodes.Intro: Disobeying Hiccup, the twins follow a retiring Eruptodon to its final resting place, Vanaheim, and learn why no human has ever gone there before.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x5

Episodes.Intro: When a pair of outcasts visits the Edge seeking the help of Thor Bonecrusher, Fishlegs allows Snotlout to hypnotize him to evoke his mighty alter ego.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x6

Episodes.Intro: After the Edge is ambushed by a group of Singetails, the Riders quickly take flight to ward them off, but are shocked when they get a closer look.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x7

Episodes.Intro: The Riders flee to Berk, where Stoick’s plan for defeating the Flyers, which will require a painful sacrifice, spurs Hiccup to seek an alternative.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x8

Episodes.Intro: An unlikely ally helps Hiccup uncover Singetail behaviors that can be exploited to conquer the Flyers. An overconfident Krogan makes a strategy error.
Episodes.Name: DreamWorks Dragons 7x9

Name: DreamWorks Dragons
